channel.title: Gamejam on Gasimo
channel.description: Recent content in Gamejam on Gasimo

item.title: Reality Check, our GameJam submission!
item.description: Me and my friends Barbo and Ondrej competed in the 42 hours GDS Gamejam! You can play our submission over at my Itch.io page! Whats Reality Check? Its a stylized puzzle-platformer, where you play as a silly wizard being exploring the world with a twist. You possess the ability to rift between alternate versions of reality. One being authentic while the other is a facade of the real world. Gameplay Solve puzzles, explore dual worlds, and collect some shiny stars.
